+1: Each player discards a card.
−2: Target player sacrifices a creature.

mainboard.name: Sevinne's Reclamation
mainboard.oracle_text:
Return target permanent card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. If this spell was cast from a graveyard, you may copy this spell and may choose a new target for the copy.

mainboard.name: Kiora, the Rising Tide
mainboard.oracle_text:
When Kiora enters, draw two cards, then discard two cards.
Threshold — Whenever Kiora attacks, if there are seven or more cards in your graveyard, you may create Scion of the Deep, a legendary 8/8 blue Octopus creature token.

mainboard.name: Monastery Mentor

Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

mainboard.oracle_text:

When this enchantment leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

mainboard.name: Proft's Eidetic Memory
mainboard.oracle_text:
When Proft's Eidetic Memory enters, draw a card.
You have no maximum hand size.
